channel.title: product adoption on FinanClub

item.title: NARI
item.description: score:144 Chances: Inari Medical Inc. continues to benefit from its commitment to understanding the venous system, which has resulted in positive two-year interim results from the CLOUT registry, showing significant improvement in patient’s post-thrombotic syndrome and lower rethrombosis-related events. The company’s revenue climbed 22.
